Summary._: Some southbound [5] trains via [2] line from 149 St to Nevins St because of signal problems at Brooklyn Bridge.

Description._: Some southbound [5] trains via [2] line from 149 St to Nevins St because of signal problems at Brooklyn Bridge.

LongDescription:
Some southbound [5] trains are stopping along the [2] line from 149 St-Grand Concourse to Nevins St.

Some southbound [4] trains end at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Some southbound [4] and [5] trains end at 86 St or Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall.

These service changes are because of signal problems at Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall.

Expect delays in [4], [5] and [6] train service, and listen to announcements for service changes on your train.

Description._: Southbound [F] and Metropolitan-bound [M] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 42 St-Bryant Park.

LongDescription: Southbound [F] and Metropolitan-bound [M] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 42 St-Bryant Park.

Summary._: Northbound [R] via [Q] line from 57 St-7 Av to Lex Av-63 St then via the [F] line to Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at Lex Av-59 St.

Description._: Northbound [R] via [Q] line from 57 St-7 Av to Lex Av-63 St then via the [F] line to Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at Lex Av-59 St.

LongDescription:
Some northbound [R] trains are stopping along the [B] line from DeKalb Av to 47-50 Sts-Rockefeller Ctr then via the [F] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av.

Northbound [R] trains are stopping along the [Q] line from 57 St-7 Av to Lexington Av-63 St then via the [F] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av.

These service changes are because of signal problems Lexington Av-59 St.

Expect delays in [N], [Q], [R] and [W] train service.

Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  May 7 - 11, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 3 PM  [7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  May 7 - 11, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 3 PM  [7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | May 7 - 11, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM
[7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts


For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or 74 St and transfer
to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 330 PM to 8 PM No [A] service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 330 PM to 8 PM No [A] service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection | Until May 18, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM & 3:30 PM to 8 PM
No [A] service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St


[A] trains that were scheduled to operate to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St will operate to/from Euclid Av instead.

[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel.

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Beach 90 St, Beach 98 St, Beach 105 St and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until Friday May 18, 2018 [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  Until Friday May 18, 2018 [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection | Until Friday May 18, 2018
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St


[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52 SBS, Q53 SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Apr 30 until May 11,  Mon to Fri , 945 AM to 330 PM Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Apr 30 until May 11,  Mon to Fri , 945 AM to 330 PM Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Apr 30 until May 11, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
